title: The Perfect Wife
author: VD
content_html:
I don’t talk much about my marriage, in part to maintain some modicum of privacy, but mostly because it simply isn’t anyone else’s business. That being said, I don’t mind pointing out that you know a woman is worth far more than rubies when people can’t believe she exists because she is obviously too ideal to be real.

DISCUSS ON SG
